tag_list: yourportal, projectparties-com, chelsea-grint, marketing, public-relations, branding
overview:
Chelsea Grint is Director of Development at Robert Partners LLC and handles the branding, marketing and public relations for YourPortal and ProjectParties.com. Grint also manages the intern team and is developing a client relations program.

Currently Grint is working towards her Masters in the IMC (Integrated Marketing Communications) program at Roosevelt University in downtown Chicago. She holds a Bachelors degree in public relations which she earned from the University of South Florida in Tampa.

You can follow her on Twitter @Chrgrint.
